branchCategory.name: AXTS
branchCategory.description: <p>AXTS040-X2 series pulse blowing valve air saving unit automatically turns the air flow on and off to improve the efficiency of blowing through a cycling action.&nbsp; Additionally, they can reduce air consumption versus a continuous blow scenario.&nbsp; The On/Off timing is user selectable.</p>

branchItem.name: AXTS040-X2, Air Saving Unit
branchItem.description: <p>AXTS040-X2 series pulse blowing valve air saving unit automatically turns the air flow on and off to improve the efficiency of blowing through a cycling action.  Additionally, they can reduce air consumption versus a continuous blow scenario.  The On/Off timing is user selectable.</p>
